Classification: Scripted
Genre: Action | Crime | Drama | Thriller

New drama about the work of an undercover police team whose patch is the badlands of Seattle, Washington.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-30798)

This is some piece of shit racist TV-show. Steven "Fatfuck" Seagal is soooo proud to not be 100% white! 

This overweight has-been thinks saying "White trash" three times within 15 minutes is giving him "street cred" or being cool. White this, white trash that. WTF. 

Go back to your reservation, Mr. Seagal. We don't need racists like you. 

Antiracism is just a codeword for anti-white.
I'm as white as they come, and a libertarian, and I don't find the show offensive. I hope you will continue uploading episodes. There should have been E2 on April 6.
